name: Blockchain Technology
content: With blockchain technology set to play an integral role in everything from finance and banking to healthcare, supply chain management, and communication, the need for increased awareness on what the technology entails and how one can go about acquiring expertise in any of the numerous sub domains, is the need of the hour. Investment in blockchain technology solutions is expected to reach close to 16 billion dollars by 2023\. Additionally, the number of job postings on Linkedin advertising for professionals with expertise in blockchain technology also tripled during 2019-2020\. This is a clear indication of the fact that the world is gradually progressing into a blockchain revolution that is set to shape all facets of modern society in the years to come.
